capabilityDescription.en: Renames one or more fields in each Record of a FlowFile. This Processor requires that at least one user-defined Property be added. The name of the Property should indicate a RecordPath that determines the field that should be updated. The value of the Property is the new name to assign to the Record Field that matches the RecordPath. The property value may use Expression Language to reference FlowFile attributes as well as the variables `field.name`, `field.value`, `field.type`, and `record.index`
capabilityDescription.zh: Renames one or more fields in each Record of a FlowFile. This Processor requires that at least one user-defined Property be added. The name of the Property should indicate a RecordPath that determines the field that should be updated. The value of the Property is the new name to assign to the Record Field that matches the RecordPath. The property value may use Expression Language to reference FlowFile attributes as well as the variables `field.name`, `field.value`, `field.type`, and `record.index`

en.description: Allows users to specify a new name for each field that matches the RecordPath.
en.value: The new name to assign to the Record field

zh.description: Allows users to specify a new name for each field that matches the RecordPath.
zh.value: The new name to assign to the Record field

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for writing out the records

zh.description: 指定用于写入记录的控制器服务

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for reading incoming data

zh.description: 指定用于读取传入数据的控制器服务

failure.en: If a FlowFile cannot be transformed from the configured input format to the configured output format, the unchanged FlowFile will be routed to this relationship
failure.zh: 如果FlowFile无法从配置的输入格式转换为配置的输出格式，则未更改的FlowFile将被路由到此关系

success.en: FlowFiles that are successfully transformed will be routed to this relationship
success.zh: 成功转换的FlowFiles将路由到此关系

record.index.en: This attribute provides the current row index and is only available inside the literal value expression.
record.index.zh: 此属性提供当前行索引，仅在文字值表达式中可用。
